title: Good old GD
body:
so i just got back and man, this was a sad day. i realised that Gd is no more. what will happen to everyone? are you all here now? i feel so lonely. 

Also wtf why the heck wont riot listen to its it player base, we DIDNT WANT THIS, WE WERE FINE ON GD.
But thats just same old same old, riot never listened to the player base in the first place so why start now i guess.

replies.body:
A few of the regulars just left entirely, which is sad aye.

The rest either hangs around in "General Discussion" chat group, or still drop in and out of Board occasionally.

Board is mostly a ghost town, sure there are people making new threads but the amount of discussion that actually goes on per thread is really low. Because the system isn't made with proper discussion and thread tracking to begin with, you can now only track with replies to you otherwise it's pure busy work to dig out the ones you had posted in and it's tbh not really good.
i wish you could trademark forum code. Then reddit could sue the %%%%y boards technicians that forced us on this lol.

Well, the whole boards thing rly was a Global rito decision. And if we were to try to change ritos mind then we would have had to try contact an NA rioter but that obvs didnt happen because hardly any ritoer frm other servers went on oce forums besides meddler and tera
